snippet: With help from a University of Chicago group, a craft beer maker has been working for more than year to replicate a 5,000-year-old Sumerian beer.
abstract: Team at Great Lakes Brewing Company, craft beer maker based in Ohio, is working with archaeologists at University of Chicago to replicate 5,000-year-old Sumerian beer; such collaborations have increased across the country, reflecting a growing interest in artisan beer.
lead_paragraph: With help from a University of Chicago group, a craft beer maker has been working for more than year to replicate a 5,000-year-old Sumerian beer.

headline.main: For Its Latest Beer, a Craft Brewer Chooses an Unlikely Pairing: Archaeology
headline.print_headline: For Its Latest Beer, a Craft Brewer Chooses an Unlikely Pairing: Archaeology
